text: How will the availability of the #COVID19 #vaccine impact the workforce? Can employers mandate their employees must be vaccinated? MoFo’s Michael Ward and Janie Schulman explore these questions and more in this MoFo Perspectives #LifeSciences #podcast: https://t.co/Ry6Lm6AsC9 https://t.co/hQxDw2Ft4z
